entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22 except minus 18 near Chetwynd. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 except minus 18 near Chetwynd. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm near the Rockies. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
